TopicTitle: How i forgot to kill horizontal velocity but managed to live to see the firework

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, during my spare block at school i decided i would get to the mun. And i did, however i forgot one crucial thing: Kill Your Horizontal Velocity!!!

This video is pretty much what i did after i lived. Oh and i wanted to include the crash footage but i accidentally deleted it.

Enjoy.

Edit: It seems bill, jeb, and bob are all pleased at the fireworks!
